name: GetTimeEntryPricesById
description: Use this endpoint to load a single Time entry prices by id/number.

$ul:
**costPrice**: The time entry cost price, calculated based on the activity cost price or on the employee cost price when no activity price is provided.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**number**: The time entry identifier.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**salesPrice**: The time entry sales price, calculated based on the activity sales price or on the employee sales price when no activity price is provided.

Read-only: true

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**errorCode**: The error code.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logId**: The unique log identifier of the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**logTimeUtc**: The UTC time of the error being logged.
